fields.label: Site name
fields.description: Name of this website as it appears in the website, including in the "Return to [site-name] home" link in the footer

fields.label: Organization name
fields.description: Name of the organization that owns this site. Appears in the title of the "About [organization-name]" link in the "About" module

fields.label: Default language
fields.description: Sets the default text encoding for the entire site

fields.label: Local area code
fields.description: Area code for local phone numbers. [Add note as to where this is used]

fields.label: Enable auto-detection of phone numbers
fields.description: On some web browsers (e.g., iOS), phone numbers are automatically detected and turned into tappable or clickable links. Uncheck this box to disable this behavior site-wide.
